name: Bounce Rejected Maps FREE
description:
Bounce Rejected Maps
Originally rejected, but now available: The 15 hardest maps we ever created.
Our game designer said people are too weak to play this maps.
Come on, prove the opposite!

Explore all the new maps in the amazing and fantastic touch version of the classic Bounce game from the good old mobile devices.
You must role and bounce the ball throught the maps.
Collect all items! Find the exit!
Avoid any killing spikes.

Share your current reached level at Facebook and Twitter!

HOW TO PLAY:
Touch on left or right side of the display to move the ball left or right.
Touch in the middle of the display to make the ball jump.
Alternative use the accelerator and tilt your device to control the balls flying direction.

Can you survive the strength ?
Download now, it's free!
Have fun and be cool!
